extendedInfo.description: Two or more children want play with only one mobile, this is your application.Share your mobile with the children. Select a game or an application, set time by turn (between 1 to 30 minutes turn) and playing!Warn your children with a sound or/and saying the name.How to play:1-Config time between turn and warning.2-Add players.3-Select application or game.4-Finally stop application.
